#!/bin/bash
#
# Name: newpost
# Author: Andrew Pantuso
# Description:
# Generates header for new markdown posts 

err() {
  echo "[$(date +'%Y-%m-%d %T %z')]: $@" >&2
}

main() {
  if [[ $# -lt 1 ]]; then
      err "Error: File name not given"
      exit
  fi
  
  local filename="$(date +'%Y-%m-%d')-$1.markdown"

cat <<EOF > "${filename}"
---
title:
author: Andrew Pantuso
photos: 
tags:
---

TEASER
<!--more-->
BODY
EOF

}

main "$@"
